title: You travel in time & you saw humanity in 2500, deteriorated to the Stone Age, you go back to 2017, could you change it if you knew how it happened? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well can I talk to the people and ask them how it happened. Also I probably can’t prevent it because I hold no political position. I wouldn’t tell people I went to the future since people would think I’m crazy. I would start a career in politics if something in my timeline cause it and I could stop it. If I would get a bunch of modern books about medicine,architecture,farming,technology and etc. I would tell my children to keep it safe and add new ones if new advances occur. Hopefully it will be safe until 2500 and society could use the knowledge to advance.
